# Iris Classification Problem.

### Iris is genus of 260-300 species of flowering plants.It takes its name from the Greek word for a rainbow, which is also the name for the Greek goddess of the rainbow, Iris.

### In this dataset we are given only with three species of iris.


![iris_three_species.jpg](attachment:iris_three_species.jpg)

### Fig. from left
1. ### Iris setosa
2. ### Iris Virginica
3. ### Iris Versicolor

   
### We will build a classification model which can classify these three species  based on the length and width measurements of their sepals and petals.
